instructions.reason_for_call: You ordered some things for your daughter but she has not received them, so you want to know which address the order was sent to, the tracking number, and if the order is still in transit. You also want to check if the storage of the tablet you ordered. Lastly, you want to change your default address to your daughter's address so that you don't have to change it every time you order something for her.
instructions.known_info: You are Lucas (lucas_santos_6600), you live in Denver CO 80239, and your daughter lives in Chicago.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a lonely man and you want to talk to the agent for a while.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I hope you're having a good day. It's a bit quiet here in Denver today, so I thought I'd check in on an order I placed. I bought some things for my daughter who lives out in Chicago, but she hasn't received them yet. I was hoping you could help me look into that?

message.content: Hello! I hope you're having a good day. It's a bit quiet here in Denver today, so I thought I'd check in on an order I placed. I bought some things for my daughter who lives out in Chicago, but she hasn't received them yet. I was hoping you could help me look into that?

messages.content:
Oh, thank you for checking that. 943 Maple Drive, Suite 356... yes, that's her place. It's funny, she's always so busy with work, she probably just hasn't had a chance to open the door or check the mailroom. You know how kids are these days, always on the go! 

Could you tell me the tracking number for that order? I'd like to give it to her so she can check with her building manager. Also, I'm a bit worried about the tablet I sent—do you happen to know what the storage capacity on that one was? I want to make sure she has enough room for all her photos.

message.content:
Oh, thank you for checking that. 943 Maple Drive, Suite 356... yes, that's her place. It's funny, she's always so busy with work, she probably just hasn't had a chance to open the door or check the mailroom. You know how kids are these days, always on the go! 

Could you tell me the tracking number for that order? I'd like to give it to her so she can check with her building manager. Also, I'm a bit worried about the tablet I sent—do you happen to know what the storage capacity on that one was? I want to make sure she has enough room for all her photos.

messages.content:
64GB, okay. I hope that's enough for her! She takes so many pictures of her cat. It's nice to have someone to talk to about this; it gets a bit lonely here in Colorado during the week.

Since I'm always sending her surprises, I was wondering if we could change my default shipping address to her address in Chicago? That way I don't have to keep typing it in every time I want to send her something. It would make things much easier for an old man like me.
